name: EvnTide Online: Hunt for the White Whale
name_original: EvnTide Online: Hunt for the White Whale
description:
A combination of the Nokia 3310, Dying MMO, and Altomare Jam, though I didn't quite manage to get it all done in time for the earlier deadlines.

Aaaand of course there's a game-breaking bug that I'm only finding 10 minutes after the upload closes... Well, if you wanna play a fixed version before the jam ends, you can find it here:

Win MacOS Linux RaspberryPi

Controls
Arrows - Navigation
Enter/Space/X - Interact
S - Ship Overview Shortcut
M - Toggle Minimap
L - Toggle Sound
Escape - Back/Quit
